content_summary: Michael Levin discusses the future of biological augmentation and bioengineering, envisioning a future where humans are not confined to the bodies they are born with. He highlights the limitations of our current physical and mental state, which are influenced by stochastic processes such as cosmic rays affecting embryonic cells.
